snippet.title: Sonic Liquid Survival - Demo 2 SAGE 2019 Release! Link in the description.
snippet.description:
Demo of Sonic Liquid Survival for SAGE 2019 is out for you to play! This time with more story, more characters, more stages and more customization! Have fun!

Sonic Liquid Survival is a 3D Sonic fan game inspired by Sonic Adventure series, with momentum based physics like classics, original zones and bosses, many playable characters and completely new story with animated 3D cutscenes. The game was developed in Unity using HedgePhysics and BumperEngine.

Download links:
https://mega.nz/#!u0sngY5C!Q8iOQKABS-w39DMrdzzQnWsLw4Syuz8y2s4zb6HKFSw
https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1toB-n6PtY7LdxuUHDGWH4o3-se4tkjcX&export=download
http://www.mediafire.com/file/jw5j9e9dlsftayd/Sonic_Liquid_Survival_Demo_2__.7z

SFGHQ/SAGE page: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-liquid-survival-demo-2.358/

Trailer music from MadWorld: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qegQcqMxhwg

#sonicthehedgehog #sonicfangame #sage #sonicamateurgamesexpo
